LanguagData.VPEAC.ThrallsMultiplierInt: Thralls will get their learning multiplied by {multiplier} (instead of 0)
LanguagData.VPEAC.HonourWillDecreaseGoodwill: 1 Honour you would pay for permit cooldown will decrease goodwill by
LanguagData.VPEAC.NotStrongEnough: The {caster_nameDef}'s psycast gets repelled by the {target_nameDef} psychic field, {caster_nameDef} should be at least the same level as {target_nameDef} to perform this cast.
LanguagData.VPEAC.NotEnoughPoints: Target has already spent their psycast potential
LanguagData.VPEAC.TargetMustBeSameFactionAsCaster: Target must be prisoner or colonist.
LanguagData.VPEAC.TargetMustBePrisonerOrSlave: Target must be prisoner or slave.
